meta.description: I am currently a first year undergraduate student at HKUST, and I am in the School of Engineering.
meta.author: WU Zhiang

posts.title: Studying Diary
posts.text: 19-20 Spring2020.02​ 20200203：这几天一直处于被组原劝退的状态，努力看MIT6.004的video，可能因为我物理基础太差了，MOSFET硬是看了好久才明白是干啥的，希望能继续保持一天一个lecture的进度，在coursera上学的ML进度也别被拖了。现在觉得科大的课是真的差劲。突然发现Typora在我的机器上一个奇怪的bug，进入编辑器后就无法切换一些标点类型了:(​ 20200205：因为注册暑校的事情又耽误进度了，我总会找一些毫不相关的借口来自我安慰。感觉之前卡在MOSEFET有点久，好像有些东西不太需要知道得很清楚，明明就是我物理一窍不通，争取明天和后天把quiz1的内容解决，然后暂停一下。最近想了想，自己好像还是喜欢理论，对security其实并不很有兴趣，AI还是未知，虽然我离清华YAO Class、上交ACM Class差了十万八千里，但是咸鱼也要有梦想。

posts.title: MIT6.004 study notes
posts.text: Unit 1: Basics of InformationMIT好硬核啊，感觉这门课总体上应该是讲计算机组成的， 但是居然从Information Theory引入？？？ Information Let $\mathit{E}$ be some event which occurs with probability $\mathit{P(E)}$. If we are told that $\mathit{E}$ has occured, then we say that we have received $\mathit{I(E)} = \log_2 \frac{1}{\mathit{P(E)}}$ bits of information. Base of log is unimportant Information: reduction inuncertainty. Entropy A $\mathit{Zero-memory}$ $\mathit{information}$ $\mathit{source}$ $\mathit{S}$ is a source that emits symbols from an alphabet ${\mathit{s_1, s_2, … , s_n}}$ with probabilities ${\mathit{p_1, p_2, … , p_n}}$, respectively, where symbols emitted are statistically independent. The average amount of information in observing the output of the source $\mathit{S}$ is called $\mathit{Entropy}$. $\mathit{H(S)} = \sum_{i}^n p_i \cdot \mathit{I(s_i)}$ EncodingUpdate：20200205，今天看到Unit5的一半实在困得不行就不看了。Reference: Chris Terman. 6.004 Computation Structures. Spring 2017. Massachusetts Institute of Technology: MIT OpenCourseWare, https://ocw.mit.edu. License: Creative Commons BY-NC-SA.?
恭喜吴某终于解决了spawn failed的问题，环境变量不嫌多，一个不行设两个:)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
